attribute.name: currencySymbol
attribute.description: The currency symbol used to format a currency value. Defaults to the currency symbol for locale.

attribute.name: groupingUsed
attribute.description: Specifies whether output will contain grouping separators. Default: true.

attribute.name: integerOnly
attribute.description: Specifies whether only the integer part of the input will be parsed. Default: false.

attribute.name: locale
attribute.description: The name of the locale to be used, instead of the default as specified in the faces configuration file.

attribute.name: maxFractionDigits
attribute.description: The maximum number of digits in the fractional portion of the number.

attribute.name: maxIntegerDigits
attribute.description: The maximum number of digits in the integer portion of the number.

attribute.name: minFractionDigits
attribute.description: The minimum number of digits in the fractional portion of the number.

attribute.name: minIntegerDigits
attribute.description: The minimum number of digits in the integer portion of the number.

attribute.name: pattern
attribute.description: A custom Date formatting pattern, in the format used by java.text.SimpleDateFormat.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The type of formatting/parsing to be performed. Values include: number, currency, and percentage. Default: number.
